name: Ducky Doubles
description:
Ducky Doubles is simple to understand, yet challenging to master. The objective is to shift tiles around the board to create a tile with the value 1024. Upon winning, you'll have the option to unlock unlimited play and see how far you can really go.

There are no advertisements in this game.

Challenge friends by sharing scorecard images with friends.

Calming user-interface is night-time friendly and full of small animations.

---How To Play---

1) Swipe left, right, up, or down to shift all tiles in the swiped direction.

2) When two tiles of the same number collide, they combine to make a new tile double their value.

3) Each time the tiles shift, a new tile will appear with either a value of 2, 4, or a Ducky.

4) If a Ducky tile appears, it will double any tile's value it collides with.

5) When you reach a tile with the value 1024, you have won the game
